data.name: SaiIn Rhythm Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Soundtrack of SaiIn Rhythm. Total of 9 tracks by GaryScream.

Story

I woke up in the morning and realized that I was 30 years old. When I was upset about being virgin for 30 years, suddenly a strong light appeared in the room, and a girl who claimed as an angel appeared, she said.
"What I have just given you is, a ability will forcibly any women go into a state of sexual arousal."
Facing the sudden surprise, what kind of development will there be?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains a lots nudity and sexual content.
Contains mind control/brainwashing and non-consensual sex/rape content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
All characters in this game are over 18 years old.
